summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented: GamePage updates ensure the in-button spinner/"Spinning..." text stay visible even when the Spin button is disabled, and SpinWheel now shows a consistent PremiumSpinner-based loading indicator until the wheel image is loaded, with timeout/error fallback UI. The diff also introduces additional diagnostics/logging and broader page redesign changes that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: In-app diagnostics panel and extra diagnostic state (fetchStatus/showDiagnostics), including HEAD fetch checks and detailed console logging for wheel image failures/timeouts.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest REQ-2 asks for a visible loading indicator and a clear fallback state, but does not request an interactive diagnostics panel, network HEAD checks, or structured debug logging.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (SpinWheel description mentions diagnostics panel, fetch check, structured console logging)

hallucinated_features.description: Broader GamePage redesign (hero section, payout cards, layout/visual changes) beyond spinner visibility behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to spinner visibility during spins and wheel image loading feedback; it does not request a page redesign.
